cooking_method: 1. Cook macaroni according to package directions.
2. Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
3. Whisk in flour until smooth.
1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut vegetables into bite-size pieces and place in a large baking dish.
3. Drizzle olive oil over the vegetables and toss to coat.
4. Bake in preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender and golden brown.
1. Cut chicken into small pieces and cook in a wok or large pan over high heat.
2. Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
3. Add soy sauce and garlic and cook for another minute.
1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut vegetables into bite-size pieces and place in a large baking dish.
3. Drizzle olive oil over the vegetables and toss to coat.
4. Bake in preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender and golden brown.
1. Cook linguine according to package directions.
2. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Add minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes.
1. Cook macaroni according to package directions.
2. Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
3. Whisk in flour until smooth.
1. Cook rice according to package directions.
2. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Cook bacon in a pan until crispy, then chop into small pieces.
4. Add diced carrots and cook until slightly softened.
5. Add frozen peas and corn, and cook until heated through.
1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut vegetables into bite-size pieces and place in a large baking dish.
3. Drizzle olive oil over the vegetables and toss to coat.
4. Bake in preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender and golden brown.
1. Cook macaroni according to package directions.
2. Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
3. Whisk in flour until smooth.
1. Cook macaroni according to package directions.
2. Melt butter in a saucepan over medium heat.
3. Whisk in flour until smooth.
1. Brown ground beef in a large pot over medium heat.
2. Add chopped onion and cook until softened.
3. Add canned tomatoes
1. Cook linguine according to package directions.
2. Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Add minced garlic and cook for 1-2 minutes.
1. Cook fettuccine according to package directions.
2. Season chicken breast with salt and pepper
3. Add minced garlic to the skillet and cook for 1-2 minutes.
1. Preheat oven to 375°F.
2. Pound chicken breast to an even thickness.
3. Mix together chopped spinach
4. Spoon the spinach mixture onto the chicken breast and roll up tightly.
1. Cook rice according to package directions.
2. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
3. Cook bacon in a pan until crispy, then chop into small pieces.
4. Add diced carrots and cook until slightly softened.
5. Add frozen peas and corn, and cook until heated through.
1. Slice beef sirloin into thin strips.
2. Heat a tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over high heat.
3. Add sliced beef and cook until browned on all sides.
4. Remove beef from skillet and set aside.
1. Cut chicken into small pieces and cook in a wok or large pan over high heat.
2. Add vegetables and stir-fry until tender-crisp.
3. Add soy sauce and garlic and cook for another minute.
1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
2. Cook bacon in a pan until crispy, then chop into small pieces.
3. Beat eggs and mix in parmesan cheese and black pepper.
4. Add spaghetti to the pan with the bacon and toss together.
5. Remove from heat and stir in the egg mixture until well combined.
1. Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Cut vegetables into bite-size pieces and place in a large baking dish.
3. Drizzle olive oil over the vegetables and toss to coat.
4. Bake in preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are tender and golden brown.
